description: The Mexican Mule is a bold drink that will spice up your next gathering. It's ready to go right when you need it, and its&nbsp;tequila-based flavor makes this an even more delicious option! The bite of ginger comes together beautifully with zingy lime for one sip, not soon forgotten.
name: Mexican Mule

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the tequila, lime juice, and ginger beer in a copper mug or glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice and garnish with a lime slice.
